system.requirements:
Tier 2; Fel 30, WP 30 Unshakeable Faith
Aptitudes: Defence, Fellowship
Veteran Talent Requirement Fulfilled
system.effect:
Veteran Talent Requirement: Character is part of a Squad who collectively succeeds on any combination of 3+ Fear or Maligancy Tests over the course of a mission.
Whenever a member of the character's squad witin communication range would gain Corruption or Insanity Points, the Character can spend a Fate Point and make a -10 Fellowship Test as a Reaction. If they succeed, the squad member gains 1d5 Less Insanity or Corruption Points, to a minimum of 0.
